column1: # SEAT TIER PRIMER (Higher number = better seat)
# 10 = Premium Plus Middle  (better than Main Cabin aisle per user pref)
# - Enter the appropriate tier number for "CurrentTier" in each flight row.
# - Rows starting with "#" are ignored by the script.
# - Only flights with Active="Y" are monitored.
# HOW TO UPDATE THIS FILE (Desktop _ GitHub)
# 1. Edit this flights.csv file locally on your computer.
#    - Add new flights as new rows.
#    - Update CurrentSeat and CurrentTier when your seat changes.
#    - Set Active="Y" for flights you want tracked.
# 2. When you're ready to upload the updated file:
# 3. Click on flights.csv in the repo.
# 4. Click the "..." menu (top-right) and choose "Replace file".
#    - Select your updated flights.csv from your desktop.
# 6. The GitHub Action will automatically use the new file on the next run.
# - Only rows with Active="Y" are checked.
# - Comment lines (rows starting with "#") are ignored.
# - Make sure your CSV header line stays intact.
